Title: Requires palmprints, fingerprints and photographs of juveniles convicted of a felony to be made available by the division of criminal justice services to law enforcement
Summary: Requires palmprints, fingerprints and photographs of juveniles convicted of a felony to be made available by the division of criminal justice services to law enforcement agencies upon demand.
LawCode: Amd ยง354.1, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the family court act, in relation to allowing law enforcement agencies access to fingerprints of juveniles adjudicated juvenile delinquents for commission of a felony
